products.name: Smartwatch
products.description: From our Legends Collection, the Naga was inspired by the mythical water dragon that protects the ocean's pearl. Wear facing inward to be bestowed with love and abundance, or outward for protection.

reviews.title: Best Smartwatch
reviews.review_text: I have been using this smartwatch for over a month now and I am absolutely in love with it. It has all the features I need and it works seamlessly with my iPhone. Highly recommended!

reviews.title: Good but could be better
reviews.review_text: I bought this watch for fitness tracking and it does a great job at that. However, I wish it had better battery life as I have to charge it every night. Overall, a good product from Apple.

custom_tabs.title: Features
custom_tabs.content: The Apple Watch Series 7 is the most advanced Apple Watch yet. It features a larger Retina display, improved durability, and faster charging. With new watch faces and workout types, it's the perfect companion for your active lifestyle.

custom_tabs.title: Compatibility
custom_tabs.content: The Apple Watch Series 7 requires an iPhone 6s or later with iOS 15 or later. It is not compatible with Android devices.

products.name: Himalaya Herbals Purifying Neem Face Pack
products.description: Himalaya Herbals Purifying Neem Face Pack is a herbal face pack that helps to remove impurities and excess oil from the skin. It contains neem and turmeric which are known for their antibacterial and anti-inflammatory properties. This face pack helps to prevent acne and pimple breakouts, leaving the skin soft and radiant.

Benefits: Removes impurities and excess oil from the skin

reviews.comment: Love this face pack! It leaves my skin feeling so soft and clean.
Great product! My acne has cleared up so much since I started using this face pack.

custom_tabs.title: Ingredients
custom_tabs.content: This face pack contains neem and turmeric which are known for their antibacterial and anti-inflammatory properties, and also helps to remove impurities and excess oil from the skin.

custom_tabs.title: How to use
custom_tabs.content: Apply a thick layer of the face pack on clean face and neck, avoiding the area around the eyes. Leave it on for 15-20 minutes and then rinse thoroughly with water.
